content: Firstly, on the U.S. business, you've -- your tequila performance continues to be very strong, but perhaps there was quite significant weakness across Crown Royal, Vodka and the Scotch portfolio, with the expectation of getting back to that sort of mid-single-digit level if tequila -- I think it's reasonable to assume that Secular performance still outperforms the wider spirits category, but that then assumes that you're comfortable with slightly lower growth, particularly in those three major categories for you.
